notes: This parameter is available starting with Oracle Database 12c Release 2 (12.2.0.1).

property.Oracle RAC: Different instances can use different values.
property.Range of values: 0 to the maximum integer. The value of 0 indicates that there is no limit.

section:
MAX_IDLE_TIME specifies the maximum number of minutes that a session can be idle. After that point, the session is automatically terminated.

Note:

This parameter is available starting with Oracle Database 12c Release 2 (12.2.0.1).
